channel.title: Adding a emote to an item
channel.description:
Right, so im using a richscape source and recently added dragon claws. Now when i attack with them the claws vanish and i start hitting loads of times in whats meant to be 1 hit. Im not sure how to change this but i figured if i could add torag hammers emote to the claws it would go away. Could someone help me or post a link for a tut on this please?
Source being used: Richscape v4
